description:
Striking the balance between protection and efficiency, these high-performance trail runners are ideal for tackling medium distances. Well-cushioned, responsive midsoles protect your feet and aggressive lugs check speed on descents. Mesh uppers use thermally welded polyurethane overlays for structure and durability.

  • Mesh upper is highly breathable with PU overlay for durability
  • GORE-TEX membrane keeps water out while allowing exceptional breathability
  • Sock-Fit™ construction provides a snug and secure fit
  • Full TPU rands to protect against abrasion
  • EVA midsole for cushion and energy return
  • Vibram® Presa® soles for lightweight grip on wet and dry surfaces
  • 4mm lugs give you traction in loose terrain
name: Scarpa Ribelle Run Gore-Tex Trail Running Shoes - Men's
